description: Simple bodyweight workout tracker - create and customize your own exercises A simple bodyweight training tracker you can customize to match your needs. Create your own exercises, organize them into groups, and track progress your way. No rigid templates - adapt the app to your training method. FEATURES Complete Customization • Create any exercise with any name • Organize exercises into custom groups • Choose rep-based or time-based tracking • Set 10-level progressions to match your method • Support for unilateral (one-sided) exercises • Favorite exercises for quick access with star icon (★) Two Training Modes • Record Mode: Quickly log your workouts after training • Workout Mode: Auto-guided training with built-in timers for countdown, execution, and rest intervals Training Records • Log date, time, sets, and reps/seconds • Add comments to track form notes and observations • Edit or delete past records Progress Tracking • List view: Browse all training sessions • Graph view: Visualize progress with average/max/total stats • Challenge view: Track goal achievement Goal System • Set targets like "3 sets × 50 reps" • Color-coded progress indicators Data Management • Export/import in JSON format • Your data stays on your device • No internet required Whether you follow Convict Conditioning, StartBodyweight, or your own custom program, this app adapts to your training philosophy.
